FuncDef: This command displays GTP session information
CLIs: { gtp-session imsi <imsi> apn <apn-string> | gtp-session [ mgw-address <ip-address> ] [ mgw-router <router-instance> ] [ remote-control-teid <teid> ] [ local-control-teid <teid> ] [ detail ] }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) of this UE.
Specifies the IP address of the Mobile Gateway, that is the source IP address in the tunnel header of received packets.
Specifies the identifier of the virtual router instance where the GTP tunnel is terminated.
Specifies the remote control plane Tunnel Endpoint Identifier (TEID).
Specifies the local control plane TEID.
